artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,362); on the left is a woman in a white gown with a blue overgown, white gloves, and a white hat with white/yellow plumes; in the center a man in black breeches, an orange coat, a gray muff, a black hat, and a sword at his side with blue ribbon at the hilt; on the right a woman in a blue and white gown with a yellow shawl and a yellow sash around her waist
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Quatrième Cahier, 1 Janvier 1789
